mapper.select: select id, title, excerpt, content, type, tagName, categoryid, pstatus, cstatus, ccount, rcount, weekccount, weekrcount, creatorId, creator, createTime, lastUpdate, keywords, description from blog_post where id = #{id}

select p.id, p.title, p.excerpt, p.content, p.type, p.tagName, p.categoryid, p.pstatus, p.cstatus, p.ccount, p.rcount, p.weekccount, p.weekrcount, p.creatorId, p.creator, p.createTime, p.lastUpdate, p.keywords, p.description, u.userLogo,u.userLogo50,u.userLogo100 from blog_post p left join sys_user u on p.creator = u.username where pstatus = '1' order by p.id desc

select p.id, p.title, p.excerpt, p.content, p.type, p.tagName, p.categoryid, p.pstatus, p.cstatus, p.ccount, p.rcount, p.weekccount, p.weekrcount, p.creatorId, p.creator, p.createTime, p.lastUpdate, p.keywords, p.description, u.userLogo,u.userLogo50,u.userLogo100 from blog_post p left join sys_user u on p.creator = u.username where p.pstatus = '1' order by p.rcount desc

select id, title, excerpt, content, type, tagName, categoryid, pstatus, cstatus, ccount, rcount, weekccount, weekrcount, creatorId, creator, createTime, lastUpdate, description from blog_post where creator = #{query.creator} and pstatus = #{query.pstatus} order by id desc
